original: intros h n m H0 H1. induction m as [| m']. - simpl. destruct H1 as [Hnone Hlt]. subst. rewrite Hlt; auto. rewrite partial_stream_clen'_left; simpl; auto. rewrite partial_stream_clen_fin0_left with (n:=0); auto. reflexivity. - simpl. destruct (partial_stream_clen h m') as [k m0]. destruct (h k (S m0)) eqn:Heq. ++ rewrite IHm'. simpl. f_equal. destruct (partial_stream_clen (fun k0 => h (S k0)) m') as [k1 k2]. simpl. rewrite Heq. auto. ++ simpl. destruct H1 as [Hnone Hlt]. assert (is_n_stream (S n) (h 0)) by (split; auto; intros; apply Hlt; auto). rewrite partial_stream_clen_fin0_left with (n:=S n); auto. rewrite partial_stream_clen_fin0_left; auto. reflexivity.
